## FilterSearchProps.searchOnSelect property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use the `onSelect` prop instead.
> 

Whether to trigger a search when an option is selected. Defaults to false.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
searchOnSelect?: boolean;
```
